headers.value: default-src 'self' *; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://www.googletagmanager.com https://www.google-analytics.com https://connect.facebook.net; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' https://www.googletagmanager.com https://www.google-analytics.com https://www.facebook.com https://region1.analytics.google.com; frame-src 'self' https://www.googletagmanager.com;
